viewComponents.script: var s = '';if (value)  s += "<input type='button' class='simpleRenderer' value='ON' onclick='mango.view.setPoint("+ point.id +","+ pointComponent.id +", false);return false;' style='width:80px; height:60px; background-color:;'/>"; else s += "<input type='button' class='simpleRenderer' value='OFF' onclick='mango.view.setPoint("+ point.id +","+ pointComponent.id +", true);return true;' style='width:80px; height:60px; background-color:;'/>";  return s;

var s = '';if (value)  s += "<input type='button' class='simpleRenderer' value='ON' onclick='mango.view.setPoint("+ point.id +","+ pointComponent.id +", false);return false;' style='width:80px; height:60px; background-color:;'/>"; else s += "<input type='button' class='simpleRenderer' value='OFF' onclick='mango.view.setPoint("+ point.id +","+ pointComponent.id +", true);return true;' style='width:80px; height:60px; background-color:;'/>";  return s;

pointLocator.script:
var now = new Date().getTime();   // ora corrente in ms
var last = run_state.time;               // ultimo aggiornamento del punto
var soglia = 30000;               // 30 secondi di tolleranza

return (now - last) < soglia ? 1 : 0;

var now = new Date().getTime();   //ora corrente in ms
var last = run_state.time;               //ultimo aggiornamento del punto
var soglia = 30000;        //30 secondi di tolleranza

return (now - last) < soglia ? 1 : 0;
